oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Not just any plan
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Vaarst, Mette
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
Health and welfare
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Dr Mette Vaarst explains how, through a practical and integrated approach, ANIPLAN sets out to inspire organic farmers to go beyond minimum requirements.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Vaarst, Mette (2010) Not just any plan. www.Researchmedia.eu, 2010, pp. 13-15.
